item.title: Add aptabase
item.description: https://aptabase.com - Open Source, Privacy-Friendly and Simple Analytics for Mobile and Desktop Apps. SDKs for Swift, Kotlin, React Native, Flutter, Electron and many others. Free for up to 20.000 events per month.

item.title: Add Pulse.red
item.description: https://pulse.red - Free Minimalistic Time Tracker and Timesheet app for projects.

item.title: QUEUEMAIL.DEV - Reliable email delivery API. Free tier. Send asynchro…
item.description: https://queuemail.dev) — Reliable email delivery API. Free tier (10,000 emails/per month - Reliable email delivery API. Free tier (10,000 emails/per month). Send asynchronously. Use several SMTP servers. Blacklists, Loging, Tracking, Webhooks, and more...

item.title: Add Hook0
item.description: https://www.hook0.com/) - Hook0 is an open source Webhooks-as-a-service (WaaS - Hook0 is an open source Webhooks-as-a-service (WaaS) that makes it easy for online products to provide webhooks. Dispatch up to 3,000 events/month with 7 days of history retention for free.

item.title: Update AWS CloudFront
item.description: https://aws.amazon.com/cloudfront/ - 1TB egress per month and 2M Function invocations per month

item.title: Added Lecturify
item.description:
https://www.lecturify.net/index.en.html - Free email addresses for NICK@pomelo.host.lecturify.net with 250MB storage free, with IMAP SMTP access, no webmail.
https://www.lecturify.net/index.en.html - Web hosting with sftp access for file upload and download, php available.

item.title: Adding Aiven to the list.
item.description:
#managed-data-services - Services](#managed-data-services)
https://aiven.io/ - Aiven offers free PostgreSQL, MySQL and Redis plans on its open source data platform. Single node, 1 CPU, 1GB RAM and for PostgreSQL and MySQL, 5GB storage. Easy migration to larger plans or across clouds.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://skiff.com/ - source, end-to-end encrypted anonymous email service, no additional details asked at signup, free 10GB drive storage, 1 custom domain for your own website, free 4 aliases for your email address per account. Additional Crypto Wallet support for E2EE environment.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://apptim.com) — A mobile testing tool that enables people without performance engineering skills to evaluate app's performance and user experience (UX - A mobile testing tool that enables people without performance engineering skills to evaluate app's performance and user experience (UX). Desktop version using your own device is 100% FREE with unlimited tests on both iOS and Android.

item.title: Add Apptim
item.description: https://apptim.com) — A mobile performance testing tool that empowers mobile developers and testers to effortlessly validate the performance and user experience (UX) of their Android and iOS apps. It efficiently captures and analyzes device resource usage, including CPU, Memory, FPS, Network, Crashes, Render Times, and more (FREE). The tool seamlessly facilitates running automated tests on real devices in the cloud, while offering seamless integration with CI/CD workflows (PAID - A mobile performance testing tool that empowers mobile developers and testers to effortlessly validate the performance and user experience (UX) of their Android and iOS apps. It efficiently captures and analyzes device resource usage, including CPU, Memory, FPS, Network, Crashes, Render Times, and more (FREE). The tool seamlessly facilitates running automated tests on real devices in the cloud, while offering seamless integration with CI/CD workflows (PAID).
